revisionDesc.change: checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: I have received through the reference of the Secretary of State your account for expenses incurred in obtaining the deposition of Capt. James Speed.

I enclose herewith a draft for
draft sent, Texas.
the amount, the receipt whereof you will be pleased to acknowledge.
